ACCESS_TOKEN: Access token, obtained from scripts/getToken.js (see README.md)
BOOKMARK_STORAGE_PATH: Path to JSON file for bookmarks (e.g. ./store/bookmarks.json)
MATRIX_STORAGE_PATH: Path to JSON file used for Matrix bot metadata (e.g. ./store/matrix_storage.json)
CRYPTO_STORE_PATH: Path to directory used for Matrix cryptography metadata (e.g. ./store/crypto_store)
